name: Daemon (SkullRyan)
description:
In the inner circles of the Inferno souls are damned to eternal torture.  You know this all too well...

     You are Alastor, formerly the second in comand of hell and assistant to Lucifer.  Having been forsaken, exhiled, and stripped of your demonic power by the dark lord himself you were thought to be permanently trapped in limbo. Despite this, you somehow managed to return to the depths of the inferno seeking both answers and long overdue revenge...

[ Made for EAE 2100 ]
